alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued November 03 at 3:15PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY NIGHT... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain is possible WHERE...Tutuila, Aunu`u, Manua WHEN...Through Friday night IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause flooding on roadways and properties and overflowing of streams. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The active trough to the south of the islands will bring heavy showers and thunderstorms late tonight. This will keep the potential for flash flooding through Friday night. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 315 Aoauli Aso Tofi Novema 3 2022 ...UA IAI LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE PO O LE ASO FARAILE... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai i timuga mamafa e ono tutupu NOFOAGA...Tutuila, Aunu`u, Manua TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le po o le Aso Faraile AAFIAGA...O le tetele o timuga ma faititili e ono mafua ai lologa ma tafega i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga a`afia gofie, fa`apea le osofia o auvai. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau o loo i saute o le atunu`u o le a mafua ai timuga mamafa ma faititili e ono aafia ai le atusamoa. O nei timuga mamafa o le a fa`atupula`ia ai lologa ma tafega i luga o le atunuu e oo atu i le po o le Aso Faraile. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleele, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.
